                "key5": "value5"
            }
        ],

            "doge": {
                "wow": [
                    "changed",

            "ops": [
                "added",
                "vops"
            ]

            "changed",

            "changed",

                "key": "value"

        ]

        "removed",

            "abc": 12345,

                "id": 45

        "added",
